author: AndreasL
title: Small and cheap
review:
I got this at the 2008 summer sale in LegoShop.com for around 1.5 Euro. It is very small compared to other Lego shields but it has the right size for my two year old kid for when he enters a sword fight with my 5 year old.
I would say that the recommended age of the user should be between 1½ and 3 years.
Quality is fine as with other Lego shields.
